```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(broom)

library(DescTools) # For the GTest
library(emmeans)

library(ggrepel)
library(kableExtra)
```

# Import

```{r imports, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}

# R/Excel data \/\/
vege<-read_excel("round bald datas/round bald data.xlsx",
                 sheet = "Ground Cover")
view(vege)

soil<-read_excel("round bald datas/round bald data.xlsx",
                 sheet="Soil Samples")
view(soil)

# PC-ORD data \/\/

nms<-read_excel("round bald datas/2020-2022 ordination.xlsx",sheet = "NMS22")

```

# NMS
```{r NMS Vege}

ggplot(nms) +
  geom_jitter(aes(x=Axis1, 
                  y=Axis2, 
                  color=Tag,
                  ),
              width=0.3, 
              alpha=0.5, 
              size=4, 
              shape=16)+
  xlab("")+
  theme_classic()



```


# T-test

```{r ttest soil}

t.test(Grass~Fire, data=soil)

t.test(Rubus~Fire, data=soil)

t.test(Forb~Fire, data=soil)

#combo 

t.test(All~Fire, data=soil)

```
